summary: Completed comprehensive testing of F1 Fast Lap Challenge management system. All core features tested successfully including lap time management, team mode toggle, leaderboard rankings, gap calculations, CRUD operations, and export functionality.
passed_tests: Backend API connectivity (21/21 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Add lap time entry with MM:SS.mmm format validation
Team mode toggle functionality (Name vs Name+Team)
Add entries with team information when team mode enabled
Edit existing entries via edit button with dialog
Delete single entry with confirmation dialog
Delete all entries via 'Alle l√∂schen' button
PDF Export button functionality (opens print dialog)
Gap calculation showing time difference to leader
Top 3 positions special styling (gold, silver, bronze classes)
Invalid time format error toast validation
Real-time data updates after CRUD operations
Empty state display when no entries exist
Time format variations handling (M:SS.mmm and MM:SS.mmm)
Proper data persistence across page reloads
